channel.title: Mehdi Yazdanian's Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content on Mehdi Yazdanian's Data Science Portfolio

item.title: Select Your Crew - Witness The Movie Rating
item.description: View Dashboard Project Requirements ✅ Shiny Web Applications ✅ HTML and CSS ✅ Rate Movie Based on Major Crew Selection using Machine Learning (GLMNET, RANDOM FOREST, XGBoost)

item.title: Greenhouse Gas Emission Forecast Application
item.description: View Demo Dashboard Project Requirements ✅ Shiny Web Applications ✅ HTML and CSS ✅ Greenhouse Gas Emission Forecast using Machine Learning (ARIMA | Prophet) ✅ Geographic Visualization within the app

item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description: This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – — “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text This is italic text
